title: Calories in Starbucks Bacon Gouda Sandwich
meta_description: Discover calories in Starbucks bacon gouda sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for your order.
h1: Calories in Starbucks Bacon Gouda Sandwich
assumptions: Per Starbucks Bacon, Gouda & Egg Sandwich; includes egg, bacon, Gouda cheese on artisan roll; standard preparation, no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact ingredients, portion size, and customizations. Check Starbucks app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Starbucks Bacon Gouda sandwich provides 360 kcal, 20 g protein, and 40 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Starbucks info.

tweaks.label: Substitute for whole wheat roll (if available)

faqs.q: How many calories in Starbucks bacon gouda sandwich?
What's the protein in a Starbucks bacon gouda?
faqs.a: Approximately 20 g protein from the egg, bacon, and cheese.

faqs.q: Is the Starbucks bacon gouda low carb?
faqs.a: No, it has 40 g carbs mainly from the roll; fiber is only 2 g.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Starbucks bacon gouda?
faqs.a: Around 860 mg, mostly from bacon and cheese.

faqs.q: Can I make Starbucks bacon gouda lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, remove egg or bacon to cut ~70-100 kcal; opt for modifications.
